-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

[quote ezra_epstein::on 1/26/2005 4:46 AM]
|
| I did some work with .NET a while back.  The nUnit port was pretty
| cool: annotations, rather than naming conventions, are used to
| indicate test methods.
|
| I'm wondering, now that annotations have been added to Java, is anyone
| working on reverse-porting nUnit?  If so, I'm interested in helping.
| If not, anyone else interested in this?
|

TestNG is already doing this... not exactly a backport of the port of JUnit, but it is proposing
some changes to the traditional JUnit solution.

You can find more here: http://beust.com/testng

- --
:pope
[the_mindstorm]
